title: [20pt] Localization Framework
body: Create a localization design & framework to enable translating KOC into multiple Native languages

title: [8pt] Game Script Content Manager
body: Create and manage a comprehensive game script for translation purposes

title: [8pt] Localization Direction
body: Offer direction to localization task assignees and clarify any pending questions

title: [8pt] Translation Project Management
body: Ultimately drive the completion of the localization effort and communicate about the status clearly and proactively
